name: TOTALly accurate WAR simulator THREE NATIONS
name_original: TOTALly accurate WAR simulator THREE NATIONS
description:
This game is a result of GJ4W #12 (Game Jam 4 Weekend)!

I've enjoyed 'Total War : Three Kingdoms' so much that I wanted to make my own Total War game and this is the result.

WASD = Move Camera

Left Click on a General Unit = Select the Unit

Double Click on a General Unit = Bind Camera to the Unit

ESC = Unbind Camera from a Unit

You can move Camera by drag mouse on the Minimap.
